channel.title: Patina on Annie Sullivan
channel.description: Recent content in Patina on Annie Sullivan

item.title: Trying out Vitaj Patinas
item.description: I really like the Jax patinas, but Vintaj offers some that are more like paint for metal and I really wanted to try them out. I had engraved a few extra brass business cards with pictures. One had the picture darkened with Jax black patina, and the other one hadn’t been finished at all, which resulted in the etched area naturally taking on a patina over time. Engraved brass business card with black patina.
